jdraw.framework.DrawTool

    • Uses of DrawTool in jdraw.framework

      Methods in jdraw.framework that return DrawTool 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DrawTool DrawToolFactory.createTool​(DrawContext context)
      Returns a draw tool operating on the given controller.
      DrawTool DrawContext.getTool()
      Returns the currently active tool.

      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Adds a draw tool to the editor's capabilities.

      Sets the tool to be used.
